sect2.title: System.Upper
sect2.para: This operator returns the upper case equivalent of the specified string. This is useful when performing a case insensitive comparison on case sensitive strings.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: ID Name UpperName -- ---- --------- 1 Joe JOE 2 John JOHN 3 Josh JOSH 4 Jeff JEFF 5 Jake JAKE 6 Jeff JEFF
